meta.title: DGCA CAR – Standby Counting & Rest Requirements (canonical)
meta.notes: Canonical representation of DGCA standby rules for legality engine. Minutes converted into hours where appropriate.

culminates_within_6_hours.explanation: If standby at home/hotel culminates <6h, none of it counts toward FDP or cumulative duty.

culminates_after_6_hours.explanation: If home/hotel standby culminates ≥6h, 50% counts toward FDP (CAR Part III Para 11.2.3b).

does_not_culminate.explanation: If standby at home/hotel does not culminate in duty, 25% counts into cumulative duty (Part III Para 11.2.4).

rest_after_standby.explanation: CAR Part III Para 10.3 and Part I/Part IV equivalents.

special_rules.no_split_duty_combination_note: Standby extensions cannot be combined with split duty FDP extensions (CAR).
